content:
hi there .. just have a couple random questions that I think I know the answer to, but just want to make sure i'm understanding what i see/read correctly ... :smile:

1) does a VIEW of a file count towards the download count in the default site metrics? (i think yes because the download count increases when i view :big_smile: )
2) is there a way to disable tabular file ingest for a dataset? don't think so? only at site level and/or file type

thanks!

Hmm, does the file in question have a previewer? If so, yes, I suspect the view/preview of the file triggers a download (by the previewer). And it should be recorded in the database as the name of the previewer.
No, you can't disable ingest for a dataset. Like you said, only site-wide or per file type.
Also, please feel free to create two topics next time. :grinning:
